Translations.Text: Moses said do jeho servant ja nie zvysok ja zastihnut point kde 2 rieka zist sa ziaden zalezitost ako long it berie
When they zastihnut point kde they schodza they zabudnut ich fish it zalozit its way zadny rieka sneakily
After they ist okolo ze point he said do jeho servant have obed! All this cestovat thoroughly exhausted us
He said Zapamatat Si when my zasadat rock chrbat there Ja nie zaplatit pozor do fish bol devil robit mna zabudnut it it zalozit its way zadny rieka strangely
Moses said je miesto my looking They traced ich steps zadny
They zalozit jeden z our servants my zehnat s zlutovanie, bestowed him our own znalost
Moses said do him ja nasledovat ona ze ona teach mna some z znalost guidance bestowed upon ona
He said Ona nie stand bol mna
Ako ona stand ze ona nie comprehend
He said Ona zalozit mna GOD willing chory. Ja nie disobey any command ona dat mna
He said ona nasledovat mi potom ona nie ziadat mi anything ja zvolit si tell ona it
